game.description: Retrieve the legendary Sword of Light from the dark caves of Mor'Dhul.
game.objective: Retrieve the Sword of Light and bring it back to the village elder.

tasks.description: Venture into the dark caves of Mor'Dhul and navigate through its treacherous tunnels.
tasks.objective: Reach the inner sanctum of the caves.

tasks.description: Defeat the fearsome dragon, Tharagon the Unyielding, that guards the Sword of Light.
tasks.location: Inner Sanctum of the Dark Caves
tasks.objective: Slay Tharagon and claim the sword.

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Light
